column5: MLCO WYNN LVS MGM Action suggesting Bluffer in Chief gonna kick the can on Chinese tariffs after G20 Might even see an epic Double can kick by both Fed and Trump

MGM MLCO to take advantage of dislocation between MGM price action and rest of entire gaming sector regional suppliers and macao MGM really jumped ahead of the entire pack but Im skeptical of a continued run with no pullback Interesting to see if band news is good news again after job report tomorrow I see that as biggest risk this short trade
